scripts.easy_setup: sequelize db:drop || true && sequelize db:drop --env test || true && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all && sequelize db:create --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test && sequelize db:seed:all --env test
scripts.setup_db_create_seed: sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.setup_test_db_create_seed: sequelize db:create --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test && sequelize db:seed:all --env test
